extendedInfo.description: Donut Recipes is the definitive app for donut recipes. Expect many more donut recipes in the near future.Features: - 51 easy and awesome donut recipes - Recipes are bookmarkable- Movable to SD card- High-resolution artwork for all cake recipes- Donut recipes stored on your device- Optimized for fast browsing and low memory usage

reviews.title: Good, but... Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Unable to read last lines of recipes due to banner ad being on top with no way to move them to the bottom. Can\'t access bottom of pages. Needs fixing.
reviews.author: Thomas Taenzer
